a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual number of reported deaths from any type of road incident, based on the underlying cause listed on death
certificates. Road incidents include events that involve vehicles, pedestrians, and cyclists.
Data source: OECD & National Statistic Divisions
Note: All deaths in a country may not have been registered with a cause of death.
